SEARCH
Package ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling

Class SVRefAligner

java.lang.Object
ComparativeGenomics.FileHandling.DataHandling.SVRefAligner
public class SVRefAligner extends Object
Saves all the information contained in the file SMAP, output from runBNG SV, that contains data about SVs detected during the alignment.
Author:
Marie Schmit

  • Constructor Details

    • SVRefAligner

      public SVRefAligner(int smapid, int qrycontigid, int refcontigid1, int refcontigid2, int qrystartpos, int qryendpos, int refstartpos, int refendpos, int confidence, String type, int xmapid1, int xmapid2, int linkid, int qrystartid, int qryendid, int refstartid, int refendid, String zygosity, int genotype, int genotypegroup, double rawconfidence, double rawconfidenceleft, double rawconfidenceright, double rawconfidencecenter, double svsize, double svfreq, String orientation)
      Constructor with all the data from a line of this parsed file
      Parameters:
      smapid - unique number for an entry in the SMAP file
      qrycontigid - map ID of query map
      refcontigid1 - reference contig ID from the cmap reference file (xmapID1)
      refcontigid2 - contig ID from the cmap reference file (xmapID2)
      qrystartpos - start of SV on the query map
      qryendpos - end of SV on the query map
      refstartpos - coordinate of reference contig 1 aligned position which borders the considered SV
      refendpos - of reference contig 2 aligned position which borders the considered SV
      confidence - estimate of probability of being correct for SVs
      type - Type of SV
      xmapid1 - xmap entry ID in the xmap file of the first alignment from which this SV is derived
      xmapid2 - entry ID in the xmap file of the second alignment from which this SV is derived
      linkid - link between two SMAP entries
      qrystartid - index in query map of site nearest to QryStartPos
      qryendid - in query map of site nearest to QryEndPos
      refstartid - index in query map of site nearest to RefStartPos
      refendid - index in query map of site nearest to RefEndPos
      zygosity - "homozygous" or "heterozygous" or "unknown"
      genotype - "1" for homozygous SV, "2" for heterozygous, "-1" for unknown
      genotypegroup - indels overlapping one another and belong to the same size cluster
      rawconfidence - minimum of next confidences for Indels, "-1" for other SVs
      rawconfidenceleft - confidence of alignment to the left
      rawconfidenceright - of alignment to the right
      rawconfidencecenter - outlier confidence for indels only
      svsize - estimated size of SV
      svfreq - SV frequency
      orientation - orientation, only for translocations
